mapper.insert: insert into innodb_index_stats (database_name, table_name, index_name, stat_name, last_update, stat_value, sample_size, stat_description) values (#{database_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{table_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{index_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stat_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{last_update,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{stat_value,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sample_size,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{stat_description,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select database_name, table_name, index_name, stat_name, last_update, stat_value, sample_size, stat_description from innodb_index_stats
